oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Illinois Monument, Missionary Ridge, Chattanooga, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted photograph of the Illinois Monument located on the Bragg Reservation along Missionary Ridge. Features a divided back and handwritten correspondence on reverse. December 28, 1910 postmark. [No. 185]
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park (Ga. And Tenn.); Missionary Ridge (Tenn. and Ga.); Chattanooga (Tenn.); Hamilton County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: National parks & reserves; Monuments & memorials
